product_name: Polarmax AYG TransDRY Crew T-Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Kick other base layers to the curb and stick with cotton. The Polarmax AYG TransDRY(TM) Crew T-Shirt delivers the same lightweight insulation as synthetic fabric but with soft, natural texture. TransDRY cotton is naturally breathable and provides lightweight insulation; fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Antimicrobial finish helps reduce odor. Polarmax AYG TransDRY Crew T-Shirt features a relaxed fit. Closeout.
